overview: The story of This film revolves around a few people who are driven into helplessness due to the various departments in Indian society that are inflicted by a poor system. We follow the journey of Jigar, who is going through a court case, trying to get his father's property back. As he goes through this, he makes mistakes, and an innocent woman named Avni ends up paying the price. Along with this, a driver named Shankar, who is living with a horrible past, tries to help Avni and his child.
title: Delhi 47 km
